author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Screening of 'The Force Awakens' expected to boost tourism in UK - Travelandtourworld.comTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Screening of ‘The Force Awakens’ expected to boost tourism in UK Published on : Wednesday, September 9, 2015
UK Tourism is expecting a huge boom with a major release of the latest Star War film to be screened in the UK first and not the US.
The Star Wars Episode VII, The Force Awakens will be released in the UK on the 17 December.
Visit Scotland is very happy with this move and is hoping that die-hard fans will come to the UK for the first viewing of the movie which will be 24 hours ahead of its release in the US.
However, since France will be screening the movie before UK on the 16 December, there are chances that UK may lose out on some fans but UK is still hopeful of drawing fans as it did last year with increased visitation from North America.
A spokesman from Visit Scotland said that they are hopeful that North American visitation will increase this year as the cinema is this year’s biggest event and the golf scene is becoming increasingly popular and together with so many attractions Scotland is a lucrative destination for North American tourist.
